# Draft:MITS Bhubaneswar

MITS Bhubaneswar (also known as MSB) is a private co-educational college located in Infocity, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. Established in 2003, it offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in life sciences, information technology, and management studies. The institute operates under the Basantdevi Charitable Trust and is affiliated with Utkal University. It is recognized by the Higher Education Department of the Government of Odisha and approved by AICTE, New Delhi.
History
MITS Bhubaneswar was founded in 2003 by Shri Balakrishna Panda, an educationist and social worker. The institution originally focused on biotechnology and has since expanded to include programs in computer science, information technology, and management. It is located in the Infocity area of Bhubaneswar, a growing hub for education and IT.
Campus
The MITS campus is spread across approximately 1.27 acres in Infocity, Bhubaneswar. It includes academic buildings, labs, seminar halls, sports facilities, and digital infrastructure designed to support both academic and extracurricular development.
Facilities
* Smart classrooms
* Biotechnology and IT laboratories
* Supercomputing infrastructure for AI, ML, and computational biology
* Digital library and reading room
* Seminar and conference halls
* Indoor and outdoor sports zones
* Yoga and wellness center
* On-campus cafeteria
* Nearby hostel accommodation
Academic Programs
Undergraduate
* B.Sc. in Biotechnology
* B.Sc. in ITM (Information Technology and Management)
* BCA (Bachelor of Computer Applications)
* BBA (Bachelor of Business Administration)
Postgraduate
* M.Sc. in Biotechnology
* M.Sc. in Applied Microbiology
The programs emphasize a combination of theoretical knowledge and practical exposure, especially in life sciences training such as RT-PCR, bioinformatics, and computational biology.
Placements and Alumni
The Placement Cell of MITS Bhubaneswar conducts skill development programs, workshops, mock interviews, and provides internship support. Notable recruiters include:
* Capgemini
* British Telecom
* Infosys
* Cipla
* Tech Mahindra
* Biocon
* LTIMindtree
* Wipro
* TCS
The institute also boasts an active alumni network involved in mentoring, guest lectures, and career guidance.
Research and Industry Engagement
MITS encourages both faculty and student research through collaborations with industries and research institutions. Students are supported in publishing research papers and participating in national and international conferences. The institution fosters an ecosystem that bridges academia and industry through hands-on projects and internships.
Location and Access
MITS Bhubaneswar is located in Infocity, Patia, Chandaka Industrial Estate. It is:
* ~14 km from Biju Patnaik International Airport
* ~13 km from Bhubaneswar Railway Station
* ~12 km from Baramunda Bus Stand
* Accessible via public transport including Ama Bus (formerly Mo Bus)
Affiliation and Recognition
* Affiliated with Utkal University
* Recognized by the Higher Education Department, Government of Odisha
* Approved by AICTE, New Delhi
* Accredited with NAAC B++ Grade
* Operates under Basantdevi Charitable Trust
Rankings
In 2025, MITS School of Biotechnology was ranked **64th** among **Emerging Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) Colleges in India** by India Today.
